article.title: Tybrin Corporation Receives Air Force Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is awarding a cost-plus-award fee contract to Tybrin Corporation for $17 million. This action will provide nonpersonal advisory and assistance services to fully support the Aerospace Research, Development, Test and Evaluation Advisory and Assistance Services program, which primarily focuses on robust systems engineering and technical assistance services.
